description: Our Mission:We are a small family with local roots and a passion to provide fresh seasonal cuisine crafted by hand with love. We source our products from local family owned companies, farms, and regional artisan craftsmen  to deliver outstanding Chef driven cuisine and services that respect nature, food, family, and community. Vision:We will set the standard in mobile cuisine and private events. We will run our company in a respectful manner, offer responsible food education, and provide community service to the local area. We operate exclusively in Winston-Salem, North Carolina and the greater Triad area.
name: The Screaming Radish
